title: GLITCH people are exploiting

embed.description: With this bug you can die and sell your devourer, buy it again and then click undo and you keep all of the stats from the item

body: hi rito, this is a glitch you needs to fix thxn

replies.body: This is OP, Xin Zhao Devourer + Warrior is broken, just tested it with a friend.
yep, showed it to my friends too.
Those who are smart wont do it in a normal because they can have things happen to their account for exploiting it
Those who are smart wont do it at all. Riot is more than willing to punish anyone who uses exploits, regardless of the circumstances they were used in.
they don't really care if its in a custom

Actually, they do care. When the BOTRK exploit was a thing "lols" made a thread (on the forums) about playing a (custom) game where everyone would use it (arguably, providing no "unfair advantage" to either team). "iV Zephyrs God" asked, and I quote,

>Jimz, can you gt banned for testing in your own custom that went for 15 mins for experimental purposes? and not using it after that at all?

to which MasterMirkinen responded, and I quote,

>Yes you can.
>Custom, normal, ranked doesn't make any difference. If you hack, you hack... it's pretty black and white in this case.

Source: http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=87158&page=1
